data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Preah Vihéar to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Preah Vihéar, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 147,843 lost people in  Preah Vihéar, Cambodia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 48 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Preah Vihéar to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Preah Vihéar, Cambodia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Khmer people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Preah Vihéar, Cambodia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Preah Vihéar, Cambodia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Preah Vihéar, Cambodia has a population of 153,100.

We estimate Preah Vihéar has 3,131 people who might know Jesus, 2,126 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 147,843 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 3,131 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
